data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the Attic.
The attic is drafty and dark. Items such as handmade angels and Christmas decorations fill it. There is one small round window to let in light although they do not have glass. It is very hot and smells of dust. Extra candles fill one side and donations fill another.

You are carrying a bible and a cross, and wearing some muddy shoes and a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I dropped the bible because it was dark
data.mid_motivation: I need to light the candles to see better
data.long_motivation: I need to find the donations and give them to the needy
